comments: Composite numbers n such that 57^(n-1) == 1 (mod n).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to pseudoprimes
mathematica: base = 57; t = {}; n = 1; While[Length[t] < 100, n++; If[! PrimeQ[n] && PowerMod[base, n-1, n] == 1, AppendTo[t, n]]]; t (* _T. D. Noe_, Feb 21 2012 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
